title: SOUND OFF - OCT. 15
text:
By DONOVAN KLEIN October 15, 2015 Updated Oct 15, 2015 at 8:22 PM EDT 
FORT WAYNE, IND (21ALIVE) - Live from the SportONE/Parkview Fieldhouse, 21Alive's Tommy Shoegler and Kent Hormann discuss how far celebrating should go in baseball. Jose Bautista's bat flip in the final game in the series between Toronto and Texas caused quite a stir among baseball fans. Did he go too far? 
The Komets season opener is right around the corner, do they have what it takes to bring another title back to the summit city? The guys discuss the Komets upcoming season. 
Later on the show, the guys are joined by AWP Director of Softball Operations, Jamie Schnarr as she talks about her Fall Fundies camp on Saturday, October 24. For information on the camp go to awpsportstraining.com. What are your thoughts CLICK HERE to leave us a "QUESTION OF THE DAY” comment.
